title: 2021 Divisional Round Preview
itunes:title: 2021 Divisional Round Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview each upcoming game of the Divisional Round. The heroes start with AFC and hit the Bengals-Titans first and the Wesseling brothers have something to say. Tim Graham joins to talk Bills-Chiefs. Next up, can the 49ers actually beat the Packers? We close the show by previewing the Rams-Bucs game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
